HelpText:
--- Nitro Boost Linker v{version} ---
Author: {author}

Required plugins:
  Image Library    {urlImageLib}
  Rust Kits        {urlKits}
  Custom Auto Kits {urlCustomKits}

Steps:
  1) Discord: Settings > Advanced > Developer Mode ON
     Right-click your avatar > Copy User ID
  2) /nitrolink <DiscordUserID>
  3) Check DM from bot for your code
  4) /nitroverify <CODE>

VIP granted when:
  - You are actively boosting the guild (premium_since), OR
  - You have the configured Booster role

Check status: /nitrostatus
InvalidDiscordId: Invalid Discord User ID — must be a non-zero number.
AlreadyLinked: Already linked to Discord ID {discordId}. Ask an admin to /nitroresync if your boost status changed.
DmFailed: Could not DM that Discord user. Verify the ID and ensure the user allows DMs from server members and bots.
DmSent: Verification code sent via DM to {discordId}. Run /nitroverify <CODE> within {minutes} minute(s).
InvalidCode: Invalid or expired code. Run /nitrolink <DiscordUserID> again.
CodeOwnerMismatch: This code does not belong to your account.
ApiError: Could not verify guild status right now. Try again in a moment.
StatusNotLinked: Not linked. Run /nitrolink help to get started.
ResyncFailed: Resync failed for {name} (no link record or API error).
BadGuildId: GuildId must be a non-zero integer.
BotLinkFailed: Discord validation failed. Verify the bot token is correct, the bot is in the guild, and the guild ID is right.
BotLinkSaved: Discord credentials saved and validated. GuildId={guildId}.
RateLimit: You are sending commands too quickly. Try again in a moment.
QualifiedBoost: Linked! Nitro boost detected — {perm} permission granted.
QualifiedRole: Linked! Booster role detected — {perm} permission granted.
NotQualified: Linked, but no active Nitro boost or Booster role found. The permission will be granted automatically on the next re-check.
TokenWarning: [NitroBoostLinker] WARNING: Bot token set via command — visible in server console log. Rotate this token if console access is not restricted to trusted admins.
